Articles.Content: Nope, sorry.

So it's a group of something, it's related to a god, it inspires fear, often wonder, and is a common idea.

Well, then.

Um... is it consciousness? Or- DARN IT! I CAN'T REMEMBER WHAT I JUST THOUGHT OF!!!

Wait, it was culture. Is it culture?

It is borne of culture, but no, it is not culture itself.

Not consciousness either.
A pantheon of gods?
A cult? Devils? Sin? Fanathic? Illuminati

A pantheon of gods?
Nope.
A cult? Devils? Sin? Fanathic? Illuminati
Nope.
I know! Internet trolls!
Ha! You wish! Nope. They'd be running screaming like erryone else.
Nightmares?

That's probably the closest so far. Nightmares would almost certainly encompass pretty much everything. I'm willing to accept that, if y'all don't feel like trying to guess the exact term I was looking for. (I'll tell you anyway, though.)
Night terrors?
Uhh i know what you mean... probably some demons that are stealing dreams or corrupting dreams, but i can't find a name for this...

No, no. Shall I tell you the term I was looking for?

(Nightmares not as is things you find specifically in your dreams, just things that are basically the worst that you can possibly imagine.)

So... it's like nightmares. It's the thing that you fear most, which would be called... um... a phobia?

Phobias?

I think whats-his-face got it with nightmares, though.

Whats-his-face? WHATS-HIS-FACE!?!?!? The preferred term is whats-his-pickle, thank you I guess I should start thinking up another riddle in case nobody hits the bullseye. Hopefully tougher than my previous efforts.

The term I was looking for was Eldritch Abominations. The things that defy the laws of our universe, akin to the most horrifying form of god-like monstrosity you can ever imagine -- and worse. (Nightmare is really probably the closest term anyone could have come up with, so StrandedonEarth gets the next riddle.)

I am one from many, with many from one.

Many related parts that make a whole, yet hopefully never finished.

Some of us work in harmony, others suffer from friction.

What am I?

Hopefully this is harder than my previous efforts

Edited April 19, 2014 by StrandedonEarth
Eldritch Abominations, huh? What we should have expected from a philosopher with Druid-ish pics...
Puzzles? Somthing from mythology?

Nope

I am one from many, with many from one.

Many related parts that make a whole, yet hopefully never finished.

Some of us work in harmony, others suffer from friction.

What am I?
Is it an atom?

Nope

I am one from many, with many from one.

Many related parts that make a whole, yet hopefully never finished.

Some of us work in harmony, others suffer from friction.

What am I?

I am one from many, with many from one.

Many related parts that make a whole, yet hopefully never finished.

Some of us work in harmony, others suffer from friction.

What am I?

Is it a molecule?
No, it is not on a micro scale

People?

tenchar
